name: Slime Slap
description:
Obstacle course game using physics to teach the players while getting to the goal, competing with up to 20 players.

Slime slap is a game in which we want to help teachers and students in understanding physics. It is NOT meant as a substitute, but rather something can be used in tandem with normal education. Most things that happen during the game has been made in a way so that it would behave as realistically as possible, yet still within a perfect environment.
